topic.title: Encounter Plan Of Care - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity Encounter template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)
SHALL conform to Encounter Entry template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14)

SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::PRMS
SHALL conform to Encounter Entry template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.14)
SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity
SHALL conform to CCD Plan Of Care Activity Encounter template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.25)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClass

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode (CONF-487)
SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::PRMS
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF-486)

SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue (CONF-488)
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::PRP or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::RQO

SHALL contain one or more sources of information (CONF-491)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE

SHALL satisfy: moodCodeValue
[OCL]: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::PRMS
